Title: 079: Interview with Etienne Caron
Description:
Have you ever thought about building VR (Virtual Reality) apps? Where do you start? How difficult is it? How similar is to Android development? Do you still code in Java? In this episode, Etienne Caron AndroidDev extraordinaire and expert VR hobbyist gets us up to speed on what you need to know, to start creating VR apps.

Show Notes

  • Shopify Engineering Blog (VR)
  • Demoscene
  • Save a cat from a skyscraper (VR game)
  • Rajawali - Android OpenGL engine
  • Build your first Google VR app in 10 minutes : caster.io course
  • developer docs on Google VR
  • Unity game engine
  • Vulkan API (open GL)
  • Project Rider - C# IDE
  • Shadertoy.com
  • OpenGL ES Apple docs
  • Learn OpenGL ES.com
